hero_lead: The AI‑Lab @ Roma Tre is part of the DICITA Department at Roma Tre University and of the Centro di Eccellenza DTC Lazio. We investigate modern AI with a focus on Large Language Models, User Modeling & Recommender Systems, Computer Vision, and Graph‑based Learning, combining rigorous research with real‑world applications.
paragraphs: The AI program at Roma Tre University comprises a multidisciplinary group of researchers working on methods and tools for intelligent systems.

The group belongs to DICITA, selected by the Italian Ministry (MIUR) as a “Department of Excellence” (2018–2022). In 2017, two faculty members joined the national AI Task Force promoted by AgID; since 2018, the lab has been part of the CINI AIIS laboratory. We are a partner of the Rome Technopole research project (Flagship 6 — AI, VR & Digital Twin for advanced engineering and aerospace).
